column3:
Concept ACK.

Idea: Is there any reason a user might want to load or dump but not both?

Maybe it should be a debug option... dunno.

utACK apart from the nit, seems straightforward enough.\n\nWe should indeed consider the debug/non-debug status of this option. Is it worth adding translation strings for this, or is it just for technical debugging/development purposes? Not entirely decided about this.

@luke-jr there is. I had the same idea while debugging #9810. I wanted to load the original `mempool.dat`, but not rewrite it at the exit. I solved it by copying `mempool.dat` back before the next start. And as the workaround is so simple, please let's not complicate the code with yet another option.\n

> And as the workaround is so simple, please let's not complicate the code with yet another option.\n\nAgreed. So to be clear adding this option is good, but let's not add micro-management for loading/saving specifically.

Nits addressed and squashed.

Old tip: https://github.com/jnewbery/bitcoin/tree/pr9966.1 / https://github.com/jnewbery/bitcoin/commit/89acdb0307bb00c41142753bcba6629136f672a0
New tip: https://github.com/jnewbery/bitcoin/tree/pr9966.2 / https://github.com/jnewbery/bitcoin/commit/c4e615429458f8c2159d290082940bef2fe4f263
utACK, but move the option in the help section as suggested.

Thanks @MarcoFalke . I've moved the new option to the general options section.\n\nNew tip: https://github.com/jnewbery/bitcoin/tree/pr9966.3 / https://github.com/jnewbery/bitcoin/commit/d22d7b0958ccd8f7ed2f34563029388e606e2550

rebased https://github.com/jnewbery/bitcoin/tree/pr9966.3 -> https://github.com/jnewbery/bitcoin/tree/pr9966.4\n\nAre any reviewers able to reACK? All review comments are addressed, so this should be ready to merge.
I think that `qa/rpc-tests` no longer exists in the master.
Didn't read the tests utACK a750d77\n
I'd use "save" instead of "dump" especially if this is to be an official translated option and not a debug option. Also missing a space before `(`
I might be missing something, but this is not a "connection option". Also, this could be formatted as an untranslated debug option.
Good catch, Marco! It should be moved out from "Connection options" help, e.g. after the mempoolexpiry help?\n\nI think it should be normal option, non-debug, ie. translated.
You can do else fDumpMempoolLater = false to avoid the extra GetArg("-persistmempool", DEFAULT_PERSIST_MEMPOOL) in Shutdown()
